rationale: The segment reports detection and birds destroyed without using an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The virus [H5N1] also was detected in a flocks of turkeys and broiler chickens in Kentucky last month, resulting in the destruction and disposal of more than 284,000 birds.
The virus [H5N1] also was detected in a flocks of turkeys and broiler chickens in Kentucky last month, resulting in the destruction and disposal of more than 284,000 birds.

rationale: 'detected' is a plain verb. 'resulting in the destruction and disposal' is a consequence/containment.
statement_text: The virus [H5N1] also was detected in a flocks of turkeys and broiler chickens in Kentucky last month, resulting in the destruction and disposal of more than 284,000 birds.
